amendment.description: Amendment sought to call for 1% cuts across the board.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 55 printed in House Report 115-297 to call for 1% cuts across the board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A084) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 248 (Roll no. 481).
